3: Like all legendary retreats in this world, Misty Enclave is just another place full of mysteries, with a deceptive facade.
It doesn't matter if you have killed people, betrayed your master, or taken things that aren't yours. As long as you're ready to abandon your identity, this place can be your home.
And your target is a person who goes by the name Zack. This mission is a secret from Hassen, so don't go around talking about it.
According to the brief, this is the likeliest place to find Zack.
It's easier to just ask the person in charge here.
You damn bastard! Stop where you are!
